keyfigure.tauxincidence.label: Tasso d'incidenza

keyfigure.tauxoccupation.label: Pressione sulle rianimazioni
keyfigure.tauxoccupation.description: Questo indicatore riflette il livello di pressione sulle strutture ospedaliere di rianimazione. √à il numero di pazienti con COVID-19 attualmente in rianimazione, terapia intensiva o unit√† di monitoraggio continuo in proporzione al numero totale di letti di rianimazione disponibili prima della crisi.

keyFiguresController.explanation.alert.m:
Gli indicatori devono essere interpretati con cura e alla luce delle attivit√† di screening, del contesto sanitario e delle caratteristiche della popolazione (et√†, densit√† della popolazione, fattori di rischio, ecc.), ma anche della qualit√† dei dati e della frequenza della loro risalita, analizzati nel loro complesso. Per maggiori informazioni sull'analisi della situazione sanitaria, consultare l'aggiornamento epidemiologico settimanale di Sant√© publique France (SpF) disponibile su santepubliquefrance.fr.
L'R effettivo √® calcolato su una finestra di 7 giorni da G-9 a G-3. I dati vengono aggiornati il marted√¨ e pubblicati una volta alla settimana (il gioved√¨). L‚ÄôR effettivo √® disponibile a livello nazionale (Francia metropolitana) e regionale (regioni metropolitane e ultramarine). Tutti gli altri indicatori sono aggiornati quotidianamente, dopo il consolidamento da parte di SpF e del Ministero della Solidariet√† e della Salute. A livello nazionale, il tasso di incidenza e il tasso di positivit√† sono aggiornati a G-3 e calcolati sulla media degli ultimi 7 giorni [G-9; G-3] per tenere meglio conto della loro fluttuazione. Il numero di nuovi casi √® un indicatore aggiornato a G-1, quindi senza il distacco e la contestualizzazione necessari per affermare che rappresenta completamente la situazione sanitaria.

notification.lowRisk.title: Info: stay alert
notification.lowRisk.message: Stay alert, you regularly meet positive and contagious people. Continue to apply the preventive measures!
notification.atHighWarning.title: Alert: exposure in a place
notification.atHighWarning.message: You were in the same place or event as at least one user who tested positive for COVID-19 and was contagious in the past few days. If you are a minor, discuss it with your parents or legal guardians.
manageDataController.hideStatus.title: My risk status
manageDataController.hideStatus.subtitle: You can hide your risk status on the home screen of the application. To unhide it, you will have to change the configuration below.
risk.section.measures.title: The preventive measures
risk.section.measures.body: Be sure to follow the preventive measures to stop the spread of the virus.
risk.section.mcc.title: Mes Conseils Covid
risk.section.mcc.body:
Find personalized advice on prevention and care on the Mes Conseils Covid website.

Mes Conseils Covid is a service of the Minist√®re des Solidarit√©s et de la Sant√©
risk.section.limit.title: Limit your contacts
risk.section.limit.body: Be sure to limit your contact, in particular with people at risk of severe disease.
risk.section.test.title: Get tested
risk.section.test.body:
You have priority access to the test. It is recommended that you get tested immediately and 7 days after your contact date.

To find out which day is the most suitable for you to be tested according to your situation, update your status in the "Isolation recommendation" module.

Contact your doctor in case of doubt.

If you do not have a doctor, call 0 800 130 000 to be referred to a doctor (free service + free call).
risk0.section.test.title: Where to get tested
risk0.section.test.body: To find out where to get tested, go to Sant√©.fr
risk.section.symptoms.title: In case of symptoms
risk.section.symptoms.body:
If in doubt, do not hesitate to complete the orientation questionnaire on Mes Conseils Covid or call your doctor.

If you have symptoms compatible with COVID-19, you can also update your status in the "Isolation recommendation" module, in order to know if your isolation period should be updated.
risk.section.isolate.title: Isolate yourself
risk.section.isolate.body:
To calculate the needed duration of isolation according to your situation and to protect others, you can go to the "Isolation recommendation" module.

You can benefit from a sick leave with the Assurance Maladie.

Be sure to limit your contacts, especially with people at risk of severe disease. Be extremely vigilant about strict compliance with preventive measures.
risk0.home.title: No at-risk exposure detected
risk0.home.sub: Tap for advice, where to get tested and more
risk0.details.title: No at-risk exposure detected
risk0.widget.longTitle: No at-risk exposure detected. Tap for advice, where to get tested and more
risk0.details.sub: However, do not forget the preventive measures and health recommendations
risk0.section1.title: Your risk
risk0.section1.body:
You have not been near a user who tested positive and contagious.

You will be notified if you have been in the vicinity (estimated distance to be within two meters) of a user declared to be a case of COVID-19.

Your status in the app is checked approximately every 24 hours.

TousAntiCovid will then give you the recommendations of Minist√®re des Solidarit√©s et de la Sant√©.
risk1.notif.title: Info: stay alert
risk1.notif.sub: You are regularly in contact with positive and contagious people. Check out our recommendations.
risk1.home.title: Stay alert
risk1.home.sub: You are regularly in contact with positive and contagious people üëâ
risk1.details.title: No at-risk exposure detected, but stay alert
risk1.details.sub: Do not forget the preventive measures and health recommendations
risk1.section1.title: Your risk
risk1.section1.body:
You have not been near a user who tested positive and contagious, but you regularly come across positive and contagious people.

You will be notified if you have been nearby (estimated distance to be less than two meters) or in the same at-risk location as a user declared as a case of COVID-19.

Your status in the app is checked approximately every 24 hours.

TousAntiCovid will then give you the recommendations of the Minist√®re des Solidarit√©s et de la Sant√©.
risk2.notif.title: Info: place at risk
risk2.notif.sub: You have been exposed to a moderate risk of contamination following your presence in the same place as a contagious person. If you are a minor, discuss it with your parents or legal guardians
risk2.home.title: Info place: moderate risk of contamination
risk2.details.title: You went to a place with a moderate risk of contamination
risk2.details.sub: Get tested and apply the preventive measures!
risk2.section1.title: Your risk
risk2.section1.body:
You have been exposed to a moderate risk of contamination following your presence in the same place as a contagious person who has declared themselves positive in the application.

The contact date displayed is approximate at more or less one day, to preserve the anonymity of people who test positive.

If you have any doubts, particularly about your risk exposure, contact your doctor informing him/her that you have been in a place with a moderate risk of contamination.
risk3.notif.title: Alert: place at risk
risk3.notif.sub: You have been exposed to a high risk of contamination following your presence in the same place as a contagious person. If you are a minor, discuss it with your parents or legal guardians.
risk3.home.title: Alert: high exposure risk in a place
risk3.details.title: You have been in a place with a high risk of contamination: you are a at-risk contact person
risk3.section1.title: Your risk
risk3.section1.body:
You have been exposed to a high risk of contamination following your presence in the same place as a contagious person who has tested positive in the application. You are a at-risk contact person.

The contact date displayed is approximate at more or less one day, to preserve the anonymity of people who test positive.

If you have any doubts, particularly about your risk exposure, contact your doctor informing him/her that you have been in a place with a moderate risk of contamination.
risk4.notif.title: Alert: at-risk exposure
risk4.notif.sub: You have been exposed to at least one user who tested positive and contagious. If you are a minor, discuss it with your parents or legal guardians.
risk4.home.title: Alert: high risk exposure following contact
risk4.details.title: Risk exposure following a contact: you are a at-risk contact person
risk4.section1.title: Your risk
risk4.section1.body:
You have been exposed to at least one user who has tested positive and contagious. You are a at-risk contact person.

The contact date displayed is approximate at more or less one day, to preserve the anonymity of people who test positive.

If you have the slightest doubt about your risk exposure, contact your doctor informing him/her that you have been in the vicinity of at least one user who tested positive and contagious.
myHealthController.workStopping.title: Sick leave
myHealthController.workStopping.message:
You have here a one-time link which allows you to make a "sick leave" request on declare.ameli.fr, for 7 days only after the contact date.
You can make this request from your smartphone, or you can send you this link to make the request on your computer.
attestation.form.reason_curfew.label: Reason between 7pm & 6am
attestation.form.reason_curfew.travail.s: 1. Professional occupation, education and training, general interest mission
attestation.form.reason_curfew.travail.l:
- Travel between the home and the place of work, education or training.
- Business travel that cannot be postponed, deliveries.
- Travel to make purchases of supplies required for my professional occupation.
- Travel to participate in missions of general interest at the request of the administrative authority.

attestation.form.reason_curfew.famille.s: 3. Compelling family reason, assistance to vulnerable people, childcare, disability

- Travel of people with disabilities and their carers.

walletController.title: Test wallet
walletController.explanations.title: How does it work?
walletController.explanations.subtitle:
To digitalize your test certificates and always have them at hand, it's simple: once the result of your test is available, you will receive a text message with a link (from SI-DEP platform) and instructions to follow.

This certificate will have to be presented during checks for your air travels üëâ experiment in progress, only on some flights to Corsica (Air France and Air Corsica will inform their eligible customers).

If you have a problem, you can call 0 800 08 71 48.
